page.title: 12ATTITUDES GOLDSBOROUGH AREA
page.content: As we did our survey,we asked people for their comments,Here are some of them: The{villages}are better with more people, because there is more"going on"The{post office}has many more{ { customers.}The traffic is too fast and noisy.New people coming into the villages said that everyone was very { friendly. } People like their{new homes }on the Eastfield estate.We interviewed an { American }who had just moved into his house {6 months }ago.He said that he liked it and the area very much. The {Kirkhamgate to Dishforth } { By pass}has given everyone a great deal to talk about.We still await the { Government's }decision.
